alert.note: Alert for Allen; Avoyelles; Beauregard; East Cameron; Evangeline; Lafayette; Lower Iberia; Lower St. Martin; Lower St. Mary; Lower Vermilion; Northern Acadia; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; Rapides; Southern Acadia; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis; St. Landry; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper St. Mary; Upper Vermilion; Vernon; West Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 06 at 2:33PM CDT until October 08 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Red Flag Warning for Central and Southwestern Louisiana Saturday afternoon and early evening... ... Red Flag Warning for Central and Southwestern Louisiana Sunday afternoon and early evening... .A potent cold front will pass through the region later today bringing with it strong north-northeasterly winds at 15 to 20 mph, gusting to 25 mph and dewpoints in the mid 30s to low 40s Saturday and Sunday. Low moisture will result in daytime relative humidity values 25 to 35 percent Saturday and 25 to 30 percent Sunday. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 7 PM CDT SATURDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR CENTRAL AND SOUTHERN LOUISIANA... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 7 PM CDT SUNDAY FOR LOW HUMIDITY FOR CENTRAL AND SOUTHERN LOUISIANA... The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a Red Flag Warning for low relative humidity, which is in effect from 11 AM to 7 PM CDT Sunday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...Vernon, Rapides, Avoyelles, Beauregard, Allen, Evangeline, St. Landry, Lafayette, Upper St. Martin, Lower St. Martin, West Cameron, East Cameron, Northern Calcasieu, Northern Jefferson Davis, Northern Acadia, Upper Vermilion, Upper Iberia, Upper St. Mary, Southern Calcasieu, Southern Jefferson Davis, Southern Acadia, Lower Vermilion, Lower Iberia and Lower St. Mary. * TIMING...For the Red Flag Warning, from 11 AM to 7 PM Saturday and again from 11 AM to 7 PM Sunday. * WINDS...North 5 to 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 24 percent. * TEMPERATURES...low to mid 70s. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended and or prohibited in some areas. Please check burn ban laws in your County or Parish.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
